I'm trying to find a way to make more time for my kids, but it's hard when I'm so busy with work.

i just bought new hoop earrings.
I've found that reading to my baby is a great way to bond with her and help her learn new things.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I like to read to my baby, bond with her, and learn new things.
That's really sweet! I like to go to dance lessons with my boyfriend.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've never been to dance lessons before.
It's really great! I love being able to move my body and learn new dance moves.
I'm glad you enjoy it! I'm trying to find a way to make more time for my kids, but it's hard when I'm so busy with work.
I know what you mean! I used to be in the marines, and I know how hard it can be to balance work and family life.
That's really interesting! What was it like being in the marines?
It was definitely a challenge, but it was also a really rewarding experience. I learned a lot about myself and about the world.
That's really cool! I'm glad you had a positive experience.
Thanks! I'm glad to hear you're enjoying being a mom!
It's the best thing I've ever done!
That's great to hear! I'm sure your kids are lucky to have you.
